name: Sisyphos
description:
GAMEPLAY

Your goal is to push the rock you're carrying as high as you can. Inevitably, you will drop the rock and you will have to start from the bottom. You will drop the rock if you lose your balance, if you get hit by a falling boulder, or if you fall into a chasm.

Each step left or right throws you off balance. Each step forward helps you bring the balance back. If your balance gets to 1.5 or -1.5, you will drop the rock.

CONTROLS

Move with WSAD, the arrow keys, or the D-pad.

THANK YOU

This is my first published project. It was created in two weeks for GAB Jam: Fresh Start. Thank you for being interested! If you have any feedback, please share it in the comments.

PSA FOR CHROME USERS

If you're using Chrome, I recommend downloading the desktop version of the game or playing it in Firefox instead. When I run the game in Chrome there are some noticeable audio artifacts. I don't what causes them or how to remove them. I tried reexporting and reuploading the game, but it didn't help :/
